title: Input Lag Issues - Having really bad lag spikes in game. But constant 60PFS and 20MS ping?
body:
Basically what the title states, I have 60 FPS and low 20-40Ms PING.

But i'm getting INPUT delay, i click to move or cast a spell/auto attack. nothing happens. sometimes its a short delay and sometimes its a long delay. its almost i give a command but it wont register another until the first one has be completed in game? i haven't had this issue at all until the new patch. So frustrating, also getting loading issues on the client too. On one occasion i couldn't champ select or change my summoner spells. Another time the client wont load, the home screen doesn't load, i get Errors when trying to play a game, says client needs to be restarted? i tried everything i have found on the internet, Repairing, Re installing. what else is there i can do? A week ago none of these issues occurred.

Regards,

Toby

replies.body: Ive been having some similar problems. My ping is 15-20ms but would occasionally spike to 70+. I tried running a trace route from command prompt. Did a test to google.com server and ping was fine but as soon as i did one to league servers i got timed out... not sure if its my new router or ISP
